data.generators

Class MixtureOfFloatGenerators

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.generators.MixtureOfFloatGenerators

  • public class MixtureOfFloatGenerators
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a meta-generator that acts as a mix of different underlying data generators in one.

      • generateData

        public float[][] generateData(int[] amounts,
                     int[] generatorIndexes)
        Generate a certain number of points based on each underlying data generator.
        Parameters:
        amounts - An integer array specifying how many instances to generate by each individual generator specified in the indexes.
        generatorIndexes - Indexes of the generators to use.
        Returns:
        An array of float arrays representing the generated features.
